text: Freight Train is a historic slingshot dragster.Taylor, Thom. "Pulsator Twin Engine Dragster", in "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", p. 36. Designed by Nye Frank, it used twin supercharged engines and had an aluminum body.Taylor, p.36. When owned by John Peters, running in Top Gas (driven by Bob Muravez) at the 1971 Supernationals, it was painted black and powered by a pair of Chrysler hemis.Taylor, Thom. "Duel of the Duals" in Hot Rod, April 2017, p. 11. Freight Trains best result (driven by Walt Rhodes) was a win at the Gatornationals in 1971.Taylor, p. 11. ==Notes== ==Sources== * Taylor, Thom. "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone" in Hot Rod, April 2017, pp. 30–43. * Taylor, Thom. "Duel of the Duals" in Hot Rod, April 2017, p. 11\. ==External links== * The Freight Train (homepage] * Twotogo (Freight Train page) Category:1960s cars Category:Drag racing cars Category:Rear-wheel-drive vehicles
title: Freight Train (dragster)
